title: Interactive Portfolio Website
short_description: A dynamic personal portfolio with a glassmorphism design and WebGL background.
full_description: This is a fully responsive, interactive personal portfolio website designed to showcase skills, education, and projects in a visually engaging manner. It features a custom WebGL aurora shader for the background, a light/dark mode toggle, and dynamically loaded content sections for a seamless user experience.
admin_words: The goal was to create a 'living' resume that not only lists qualifications but also demonstrates creative coding and UI/UX design skills.

title: Data Visualization Dashboard
short_description: A web-based dashboard for visualizing complex datasets with interactive charts.
full_description: This project is a powerful data visualization tool built with D3.js. It allows users to upload their own datasets (in CSV format) and generate various types of interactive charts, such as bar charts, line graphs, and scatter plots. The dashboard is designed to be intuitive, allowing for easy data exploration and analysis.
admin_words: Making data beautiful and understandable is key. This tool empowers users to find insights in their data without needing to be a data scientist.
